name: Steakhouse Black Bread
author: MAGGIE MCGUIRE
summary: This is a steakhouse bread recipe that I obtained many years ago from a friend. It makes a very dense and flavorful bread. If you like, brush the rolls or bread with beaten egg, then sprinkle some uncooked oatmeal on top before baking. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 ⅓ cups strong brewed coffee, room temperature
2 ½ teaspoons active dry yeast or bread machine yeast
directions: Place all ingredients in bread machine pan in order suggested by manufacturer
When the machine indicates the end of the final rise, remove the dough
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Shape the dough into 12 dinner rolls, or one 9x5 inch loaf
Let rise until doubled in size while the oven preheats, they should rise quickly
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven for rolls, or 35  minutes for a loaf, or until the loaf sounds hollow when tapped on the bottom
